item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 特朗普对麦金利和关税的不理解
item.description:
它们听起来很容易解决，但对普通美国人来说，却会在更多方面导致物价飞涨。【原文：

They sound like an easy fix but will send prices up a mountain for ordinary Americans in more ways than one.

】

item.title: 两艘油轮在新加坡附近海域起火，救援工作正在进行中
item.description: 新加坡海事及港务管理局发表声明称，两艘油轮自周五上午起在新加坡东部着火。【原文：Two oil tankers have been on fire since Friday morning to the east of Singapore, according to a statement from the Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore.】

item.title: 逆向投资者的成功秘诀
item.description:
Orbis投资公司的阿莱克-卡特勒（Alec Cutler）做客Merryn Talks Money ，解释其基金十年来回报丰厚的背后原因。【原文：

Alec Cutler of Orbis Investments joins Merryn Talks Money to explain what’s behind his fund’s decade of strong returns. 

】

item.title: 韦丹塔支付 2.46 亿美元后收回赞比亚铜矿
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）向债权人支付了约 2.46 亿美元，在约五年后重新获得了对赞比亚孔科拉铜矿的控制权。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd. has paid about $246 million to creditors to regain control of the Konkola Copper Mines in Zambia after about five years.】

item.title: 印度科技股在 Infosys 盈利强劲后表现乐观
中国全会令人失望，铜价将创 2022 年以来最差一周
item.description: 由于中国的政策会议未能出台更多刺激措施来支撑金属需求，铜价创下近两年来最严重的单周跌幅，铁矿石的跌幅也扩大到每吨100美元。【原文：Copper headed for its worst weekly loss in almost two years and iron ore extended a slump toward $100 a ton as a policy meeting in China failed to lay out more stimulus to shore up metals demand.】

item.title: 利率背离现象有望阻止资金流向日本小盘股
item.description: 由于日本央行可能会提高利率，日本小型股的复苏可能会面临越来越大的阻力。【原文：A resurgence in Japan’s small-cap stocks is likely to face growing headwinds as the Bank of Japan may move toward raising interest rates.】

item.title: 外资流出，台币跌至2016年以来最弱
item.description: 台币跌至八年多来最弱，原因是半导体股下挫加剧了本地股票的资金外流。【原文：The Taiwan dollar fell to its weakest in more than eight years as a selloff in semiconductor shares intensified outflows from local equities.】

item.title: 三中全会催化剂不足，中国股市下跌
item.description: 中国共产党重要官员会议的报告未能让投资者相信经济增长的新动力，也让交易商们对细节缺乏信心，中国股市因此下跌。【原文：Chinese stocks fell as the readout from a key conclave of Communist Party officials failed to convince investors about the economy’s new growth impetus and left traders in want of details.】

item.title: 信贷与存款增长不匹配将影响 HDFC 银行和 Axis 银行的收益
item.description: 印度银行的盈利增长将受到在贷款需求旺盛的情况下迅速增加客户存款的影响，HDFC 银行有限公司、Kotak Mahindra 银行有限公司和 Axis 银行有限公司等贷款机构都在努力应对高信贷存款比率的问题。【原文：Earnings growth at India’s banks will be weighed down by their struggle to rapidly grow customer deposits amid robust demand for loans, with lenders like HDFC Bank Ltd., Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. and Axis Bank Ltd. grappling with high credit-deposit ratios.】

item.title: 约马公司主席与缅甸当局通信受限
item.description: 耀马战略控股有限公司（Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd.）周四表示，缅甸最富有的富豪之一塞尔吉-潘（Serge Pun）目前正在缅甸，住在 "有关当局提供的住宿地，并正在进行合作"。【原文：Serge Pun, one of Myanmar’s richest tycoons, is in the country at accommodation “provided by the relevant authorities and cooperating,” Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd. said Thursday.】

item.title: 游客人数再创新高，日本将加快入境程序
item.description: 随着日本寻找新的方法来扩大正在推动其经济发展的旅游业的繁荣，抵达日本的外国游客可能很快就能轻松通过移民局。【原文：Foreign visitors arriving in Japan may get to breeze through immigration soon as the country looks for new ways to amplify a tourism boom that is boosting its economy.】

item.title: 中国三中全会鲜有股票催化剂：街谈巷议
item.description: 中国在三中全会上公布的长期经济蓝图几乎没有给股票投资者提供新的买入理由，交易商们现在正等待未来几周公布的详细指导方针。【原文：China’s long-term economic blueprint unveiled at the Third Plenum gave stock investors few new reasons to buy, with traders now awaiting the release of detailed guidelines in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 中国投资者抛售创纪录数量的美国股票和债券
item.description: 由于世界最大经济体之间的外交紧张局势持续升温，中国投资者在 5 月份抛售了创纪录数量的美国股票和债券。【原文：Chinese investors dumped a record amount of US securities, both stocks and bonds, in May as diplomatic tensions remained elevated between the world’s largest economies.】

item.title: 花旗集团认为印度将吸引 1000 亿美元外商投资
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的一位银行家表示，本财年外国投资者可能会在印度投资多达 1,000 亿美元，这些投资者将被世界上人口最多的国家的高科技制造业、基础设施和气候变化项目所吸引。【原文：Foreign investors will likely deploy as much as $100 billion in India this fiscal year, drawn to high-tech manufacturing, infrastructure and climate-change projects in the world’s most-populous country, according to a Citigroup Inc. banker.】

item.title: 中国经济学者在禁止算法交易的呼声中为行业辩护
item.description: 中国顶尖的量化对冲基金正在为这个陷入困境的行业辩护，反对有学者呼吁在监管收紧后禁止算法驱动交易。【原文：China’s top quantitative hedge funds are defending the beleaguered industry against pundit calls to ban algorithm-driven trading following regulatory tightening.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美股轮动交易暂停。欧洲央行决策者信心减弱。拜登竞选压力增大。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The rotation trade in US stocks pauses. ECB policymakers become less confident. Pressure mounts in Biden’s campaign. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: GC 支持的 Artiva Biotherapeutics 在美国首次公开募股中融资 1.67 亿美元
item.description: 由韩国绿十字公司（Green Cross Corp）支持的临床阶段生物技术公司 Artiva Biotherapeutics Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.67 亿美元，扩大了股票销售规模。【原文：Artiva Biotherapeutics Inc., a clinical stage biotechnology company backed by South Korea’s Green Cross Corp., raised $167 million in an initial public offering, expanding the size of the share sale.】

item.title: 关注中国经济放缓和供应前景，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于担心中国经济增长可能放缓并危及消费，而欧佩克+似乎仍将在今年晚些时候放松供应限制，石油价格走低。【原文：Oil edged lower on concerns that Chinese growth may slow and jeopardize consumption, while OPEC+ looks to be still on track to loosen supply curbs later this year.】

item.title: 阿根廷克服阻碍结束货币管制的关键障碍
item.description: 阿根廷央行周四从金融实体回购了大部分看跌期权，这使得哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统距离解除货币管制又近了一步。【原文：Argentina’s central bank repurchased the majority of put options from financial entities Thursday, bringing President Javier Milei one step closer to lifting currency controls.】

item.title: TowerBrook、CD&R 考虑联手竞购 R1 RCM
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，TowerBrook Capital Partners 和 Clayton, Dubilier & Rice 正在商谈联手发起对医疗保健 IT 供应商 R1 RCM 公司的收购。【原文：TowerBrook Capital Partners and Clayton, Dubilier & Rice are in talks to team up and launch a rival takeover bid for health-care IT provider R1 RCM Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 投资者在莫迪发布 2024 年预算案前关注这些股票
item.description: 印度自纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）上月连任总理以来的首份年度预算将为印度股市的新动力以及关键主题的可持续性提供线索。【原文：India’s first annual budget since Narendra Modi was reelected as prime minister last month will provide clues on new drivers for the nation’s stock market as well as the sustainability of key themes.】

item.title: 情绪低迷，亚洲股市和货币下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于对经济的担忧压倒了市场对降息的乐观情绪，亚洲股市和货币下跌。【原文：Asian equities and currencies fell as economic concerns overwhelmed the market’s optimism surrounding interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司是参与价值 40 亿美元毛伊岛火灾交易的公司之一
item.description: 夏威夷电气工业公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.【原文：Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc. is among the companies that have tentatively agreed to pay more than $4 billion to resolve hundreds of lawsuits over the wildfires that ripped through Maui last year, according to people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 僵尸商城之王不想永远当底层食客
item.description:
杰米-索尔特（Jamie Salter）收购并重振了从巴尼斯（Barneys）到布鲁克斯兄弟（Brooks Brothers）等数十家破产零售商。现在，他要玩更大的游戏。【原文：

Jamie Salter has bought and revived dozens of bankrupt retailers from Barneys to Brooks Brothers. Now he’s going after bigger game.

】

item.title: 野火威胁加拿大石油产量，MEG 疏散工人
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省爆发的野火正威胁着每天多达 50 万桶的产量，MEG 能源公司成为最新一家撤离工人的公司。【原文：A flareup of wildfires in Alberta is threatening as much as half a million barrels a day of output, with MEG Energy Corp becoming the latest company to evacuate workers.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Surgery Partners 正在探索潜在的出售方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由私募股权公司贝恩资本支持的 Surgery Partners Inc.【原文：Surgery Partners Inc., which is backed by private equity firm Bain Capital, is exploring options including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元本月最大涨幅带动全球货币下滑
item.description: 随着交易商重新考虑唐纳德-特朗普可能重返白宫的影响，美元汇率创下本月最大涨幅。【原文：The dollar is surging by the most this month as traders reconsider the effect of Donald Trump’s potential return to the White House.】

item.title: 据说巴西 Sabesp 公司将以 27 亿美元的价格私有化
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西最富有、人口最多的圣保罗州将通过巨额股票发行放弃对水务公司 Sabesp 的控制权。【原文：The state of Sao Paulo, Brazil’s richest and most populous, is giving up control of water utility Sabesp in a jumbo stock offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】
